TopicTitle: Whats the most embarassing thing happened to you while playing KSP?

Articles.Content:
onetime, i decided to play KSP late at night, as my computer is 10, almos 11 years old, KSP takes forever to load. My mom yells at me to go to bed. I tell her I dont know how to exit (as it is still loading) then my mom is like ARE YOU PLAYING AN ONLINE GAME I DID NOT GIVE YOU PERMISSSION TO GET ON THE INTERNET. then im like, *in fear* no, the game was loading, i was playing ksp, its downloaded on the computer, you know, that spaceship game doug got a long time ago? and shes like oh, and as soon as I am about to go to bed its done loading. and i can turn it off

Edited January 24, 2022 by IAbandonedBobInSpace
that one time my land base landed... in Eve's oceans... thirteen meters from an island.
